      • upload

        @WriteLog(FILE_UPLOAD)
@RequestMapping(value="files/upload",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject upload​(@RequestParam("file")
                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] files,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        文件上传 (最大支持30M)
        参数:
        files - 支持多个文件上传
        fileType - 文件类型 枚举
        docType - 资料类型 枚举
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • dataGrid

        @RequestMapping(value="files/datagrid",
                method=POST)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject dataGrid​(@RequestBody
                                                com.bandweaver.tunnel.common.biz.vo.FileInfoVo vo)
        文件信息分页查询
        参数:
        name - 文件名称（支持模糊查询）
        fileType - 文件类型 枚举
        docType - 资料类型 枚举
        startTime -
        endTime -
        pageNum - 必须
        pageSize - 必须
        返回:
        {"msg":"请求成功","code":"200","data":{"total":28,"list":[{"id":75,"name":"Lighthouse-20180829125649","fileTypeName":"图片","docTypeName":"管廊本体资料","crtTime":1535518609000},{"id":76,"name":"Penguins-20180829125649","fileTypeName":"图片","docTypeName":"管廊本体资料","crtTime":1535518609000},{"id":73,"name":"Lighthouse-20180829110827","fileTypeName":"图片","docTypeName":"管廊本体资料","crtTime":1535512107000},{"id":74,"name":"Penguins-20180829110827","fileTypeName":"图片","docTypeName":"管廊本体资料","crtTime":1535512107000},{"id":71,"name":"Lighthouse-20180829110757","fileTypeName":"图片","docTypeName":"管廊本体资料","crtTime":1535512077000}],"pageNum":1,"pageSize":5,"size":5,"startRow":1,"endRow":5,"pages":6,"prePage":0,"nextPage":2,"isFirstPage":true,"isLastPage":false,"hasPreviousPage":false,"hasNextPage":true,"navigatePages":8,"navigatepageNums":[1,2,3,4,5,6],"navigateFirstPage":1,"navigateLastPage":6,"firstPage":1,"lastPage":6}}

        @WriteLog(FILE_DOWNLOAD)
@RequestMapping(value="files/download/{id}",
                method=GET)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject download​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                java.lang.Integer id,
                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception

      • deleteFile

        @WriteLog(FILE_DELETE)
@RequestMapping(value="files/{ids}",
                method=DELETE)
public com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject deleteFile​(@PathVariable("ids")
                                                  java.lang.String ids,
                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        文件删除
        参数:
        ids - 多个文件id拼接的字符串（1,2,3....）
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
